RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 10 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL DRAGOON was fractious in the gate prior to the start, stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, got through along the rail to make the lead under right handed urging nearing the furlong marker and edged clear under a strong hand ride. BLOOD MOON away alertly, set the pace while getting slow fractions until mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner. ZERO GRAVITY moved up three wide before a half, inched closer three wide in upper stretch then leveled off. BOURBON WISDOM offered a mild bid five wide into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. FAHRENHEIT pressed the pace two wide until deep stretch then weakened. KRAMDEN failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set slow pace, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dragoon
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, stalked pace, got through, inside, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Wisdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Fahrenheit
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Gravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 10. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ODIE away alertly, sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, drifted to the six path entering the stretch, was p0ut to a right handed whip and maintained his advantage under strong handling. HAPPILEA never far back, rallied three wide in the six path through the stretch and got up for second. PAT DADDY was taken outside before the turn and closed ground late in the middle of the racetrack. FIRST CITIZEN allowed to settle, closed a gap late in the seven path. LAUDA SPEED chased the winner three wide into the stretch then faded. RESCUE FIVE chased the winner two wide until deep stretch then weakened. SAVAGE NATION saved ground and gave way in the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Odie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted 6path, right urging, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Savage Nation
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rescue Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, late gain, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide, 6path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: First Citizen
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed gap late 7path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 10 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HOT LASS vied for the lead between horses into the stretch, shifted out a bit, responded readily when set down under right handed urging to make the lead three wide nearing the furlong marker then finished full of run to win going away. MAUREENLOVESFRANK pressed the pace along the inside into the turn, made the lead, set the pace until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. FIRST KITTEN set a pressured pace in the two path for nearly a half then was outfinished. PERFECTINGTHEVIEW failed to menace. PACIFIC COAST pressed the pace three then four wide for a half and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Maureenlovesfrank
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, full of run, 3 wide, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean, Pope McLeanJr. & Taproot Bloodst

ENTRY.NAME: Perfectingtheview
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: First Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Pacific Coast
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 10 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J L'S ROCKETTE away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch while drifting out to win as much the best while taken in hand late. LUCY'S LOOKIN LEFT unhurried early, rallied through the stretch in the four path and finished clear for second. SILVER STICK STAIR chased the winner into the stretch and was outfinished. LITTLE BIRD FLASH went evenly. ANDIAMA failed to menace. QUARANTINA was no factor. CHACALOSA well placed, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: J L's Rockette
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted out, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantina
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Bird Flash
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Chacalosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Stick Stair
ENTRY.OWNER: Young Thomas J and Acevedo Israel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lucy's Lookin Left
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally 4path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Andiama
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 10. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLECK trailed into the stretch, swung wide, circled her field under right handed urging in the middle of the racetrack and got up in the final strides. GALILEO'S AFFAIR allowed to settle, closed willingly five wide through the stretch and just missed. TURN TO ME SUCREE set the pace off the rail until deep stretch then was outfinished. PRANCIPANTS vied for the lead along the inside and went evenly. PAO DE QUEIJO had a brief lead on the first turn, prompted the pace in the four path and faded in the stretch. TIZ THIRSTY hopped at the start, moved closer outside rivals before a half then failed to sustain that bid. CASCABRIA close up early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Pao de Queijo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, pressed 4path, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Prancipants
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Galileo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly 5wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Cascabria
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Thirsty
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, middle move, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Fleck
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, right handed urging, up in final strides,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Turn to Me Sucree
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace off rail, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Purse 40900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $25,000 Since November 10 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings2022-202 3 Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UPTOWN stalked the pace four wide for a half, went up to press the pace two wide on the far turn, surged late under left handed urging and drew off. DARK VADER raced three wide through the clubhouse turn, made the lead after a quarter, set the pace until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. MO DONT NO never far back while trailing for a half, improved position on the far turn then leveled off. CHIEF RANDEL pressed the early pace along the inside, had speed into the far turn then weakened. PRIVATE DRIVE hopped at the start, rushed to the lead two wide on the first turn, gave up the lead before a half then stopped on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Dont No
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position far turn, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, surged 2 wide, left handed urging, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Randel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Private Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, rushed to lead 2 wide, stopped 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Vader
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, assumed command, set pace 1/8pole, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 10. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPEEDY MOBILE close up from the start, responded readily when set down past the quarter pole, rallied along the rail to make the lead before the furlong marker and won under strong handling. EL MARRO pressed the pace three wide, dug in late and just got up for second. SHOW SLIDING HOME sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace until mid stretch then was outfinished two wide. PAT'S KARMA offered a mild bid four wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. CHARLEE'S MAGIC failed to menace. CLASSIC MO pressed the pace three then two wide into the stretch and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, got through, inside, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Show Sliding Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Charlee's Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Pat's Karma
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dug in 3 wide, gained second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANZA MAGIC stalked the early pace, rallied three wide into the stretch, made the lead past the furlong marker and finished full of run under brisk handling to win going away. KERRI'S MIRACLE battled for the lead two wide then inside until mid stretch and was no match for the winner. I'M JAC'D passed tiring rivals. MISS ELLIE failed to menace. BROKEN JEWEL battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch and gave way late. MARIANA was outrun. OH EYE SEE was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Jac'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Kerri's Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Eye See
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Mariana
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Danza Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, full of run, going away
